title: Constant game disconnects
body: Is anyone else being constantly disconnected and unable to return to the live game? I am with Internode and the servers constantly drop me and are unable to reconnect. My node connection never disconnects and remains connected. The constant drops have resulted in leave buster being activated and has just cost me a series. This issue IS NOT on my end and a ticket has been submitted. Has anyone else experienced this issue?

replies.body: This is beyond a %%%%ing joke now, %%%% this game until they have sorted out their sever issues.  I REFUSE to be punished more and possibly end up with a ban because RIOT cant manager this %%%% correctly. 10 mins waiting for a game is pure stupidity considering i have done NOTHING wrong. Disable leave buster and remove ALL queue times for players being affected by this %%%%.  You are bat %%%% %%%%ing crazy to do your season 5 placements with these issues
